resInfo.title: "Life Of Pie"
resInfo.discription: 'Our Family Meals are like the meals you would cook for your family if you had the time too. We surve fast food with fresh pies.'

pie.name: Curried Chicken Pie
pie.description: discription; A mild, flavourful curried chicken with onions, mango & ginger

pie.name: Chicken Pot Pie
pie.description: discription;Traditional Chicken Pot Pie in a light creamy sauce with peas & carrots

pie.name: Fireside Beef Pie
pie.description: discription;Fitzroy Beef with grated onions, carrots, tomato & spices

pie.name: Vegetarian Curry Pie
pie.description: discription;A hot, spicy curry with cauliflower, peppers, zucchini & carrots

pie.name: Moroccan Lentil Pie
pie.description: discription;French Lentils with vegetables in a lightly spiced Moroccan Curry; vegetarian

pie.name: Roasted Winter Vegetable Crisp Pie
pie.description: discription;Root vegetables roasted with apple cider in a cheddar sauce; available during the fall & winter; vegetarian

pie.name: Mediterranean Lamb Pie
pie.description: discription;A layer of caramelized onions topped with Ontario Lamb, feta cheese & rosemary

pie.name: Turkey Dinner Pie
pie.description: discription;A Turkey Dinner in a pie crust. A layer of Life of Pie Cranberry Sauce, followed by a layer of turkey, carrots and sweet potatoes in gravy, topped with a spiced bread crumb stuffing. Seasonal â€“ Thanksgiving, Christmas & Easter

pie.name: Beef and Kichesippi Ale Pie
pie.description: discription;Cubes of Ontario Angus Beef, carrots & onions in a savoury gravy spiked with Kichesippi Ale
